title: Riot Request: Make Kled's Territory show up on the Runeterra Map.
body: It's pretty clear that the massive piece of land that the Noxian Empire kinda curves around is Kled's property, so we should clearly be able to see the sign that proclaims the land to belong to Kled.

replies.body: Kled's Territory IS Runeterra, ALL OF IT

This is the only correct answer.

The map is his.
How about an easter egg that allows you to click the entire map and show his story?

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0kqbFgKd,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-12-07T06:27:14.789+0000)
>
> This is the only correct answer.
> 
> The map is his.

A red in a Kled thread?

Can I shamelessly ask for a Kled on a Skaarley Davidson Motorcycle? Running up and down the rift with his baseball bat and leather jacket? He's gotta impress sejuana on her trike
Would buy.  But sorry, I'm not in skins.

Edit: I can't believe it doesn't have punk in it.

Lota hells angels in the older generations of my home town 


Thats more or less what i think of whenever i see kled
he needs an alternate timeline where he kills anyone that gets in the map
Then make it that there is special layer/filter where the entire map has Kled's Territory written across itself, lol.

There is no land that ain't mine. Only land that I haven't got around to claim.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/44/Kled.moveMount50.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20160729193055
But it already is.... when you pull up the map it's pretty clear  where his boundaries are... you don't see them CUZ THAIR AINT NONE!!! NOW GET OFF HIS LAND!{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

> [{quoted}](name=Looking4aHero,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0kqbFgKd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-06T22:48:49.326+0000)
>
> But it already is.... when you pull up the map it's pretty clear  where his boundaries are... you don't see them CUZ THAIR AINT NONE!!! NOW GET OFF HIS LAND!{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

*laughs in Noxian*
The map currently shows only one-sixth of Runeterra and it took _years_ for us to get it. I don't even want to _think_ about how long it would take for them to map out the whole planet.

> [{quoted}](name=Cetri,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0kqbFgKd,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-12-06T22:59:07.597+0000)
>
> The map currently shows only one-sixth of Runeterra and it took _years_ for us to get it. I don't even want to _think_ about how long it would take for them to map out the whole planet.

It took so long because they retconned the lore about 3 years ago. It's in reality taken 3 years for them to work from the ground up and now their lore department is working at like 600% the speed it used to all that time ago because the framework and direction is basically set.

This would seem to imply that the entire map does not belong to Kled.

**_Heathen._**
Why the hell does he live in Trevale with Riven.
